ygData.subject: Re: A Question for Higher Levels
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye, Go to lake Rathe, but make sure you are in a group because at night some of the hardest undead creatures i have seen come out to play, when i was level 21
ygData.messageBody:
Aye,

Go to lake Rathe, but make sure you are in a group because at night some of
the hardest undead creatures i have seen come out to play, when i was level
21 some of the NORMAL skeletons there conned Blue to me....so watch yerself.
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745

> ----------
> From: James Peterson[SMTP:jim@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 9:43 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] A Question for Higher Levels
>
> Hail, I'm a 21st level Barbarian Warrior on Rallos Zek. Currently I dual
> wield polished granite tomahawk axes (don't ask about how long it took me,
> or how many fools try to take them away) and can safely say they kick so
> much ass. How else can a Warrior steal kills from a Caster??? Anyway, I
> currently only have ringmail and some banded for armor and what I really
> want is plate. Bronze plate I hear is fairly reasonable, though heavy,
> which shouldn't be a problem with my high Strength. Does anyone know
> where the best place to acquire Medium sized Bronze plate is? I've got my
> weapons, and now I need to beef up my armor.
>
> Odhinn MacDoughl
> Skald, Hand of Tyr
>
